 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּשַׁן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשָׁ֑ן‎</span> **noun masculine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשַׁנָּה‎</span> **noun feminine** usually ==lily==, probably any lily-like flower ([[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB 462 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. DB LILY</sup> [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 323</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשַׁנָּה‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (Vulgar <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), especially ***iris***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁוּשַׁנְתָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ([[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>4344</sup>), Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σοῦσον</span> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 48</sup>; original loan-word from Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sššn, šôš§n,***</u></abbr> Erman<sup>ZMG xlvi (1892), 117</sup>); — ***lily:*** in simile, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרַח כַּשּׁוֺשַׁנָּה‎</span> [[Hos.14.7|Hos 14:7]] (of Israel), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין הַחוֺחִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Song.2.2|Song 2:2]] (simile of bride), so construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשַׁנַּת הָעֲמָקִים‎</span> v[[Song.2.1|Song 2:1]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבַצֶּלֶת‎</span>); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשַׁנִּים‎</span> [[Song.2.16|Song 2:16]]; [[Song.4.5|Song 4:5]]; [[Song.6.2|Song 6:2]]; [[Song.6.3|Song 6:3]]; [[Song.7.3|Song 7:3]] and (figurative of lover's lips) [[Song.5.13|Song 5:13]] of flower-shaped capitals of pillars, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲשֵׂה שׁוּשַׁן‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.19|1Kgs 7:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשָׁ֑ן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> v[[1Kgs.7.22|1Kgs 7:22]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרַח שׁוֺשָׁ֑ן‎</span> of brim of molten sea v[[1Kgs.7.26|1Kgs 7:26]], \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשַׁנָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[2Chr.4.5|2Chr 4:5]] elsewhere only Psalm-titles: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַשֹֿׁשַׁנִּים‎</span> [[Ps.45.1|Ps 45:1]]; [[Ps.69.1|Ps 69:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלשֿׁוּשַׁן עֵדוּת‎</span> [[Ps.60.1|Ps 60:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלשֿׁשַׁגִּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדוּת‎</span> [[Ps.80.1|Ps 80:1]] meaning not clear, see [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and Commentaries al.; yet compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדוּת‎</span>, below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוד‎</span>.
